messages.subject: a "true" unschooling day
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/4/2003 5:35:40 PM Central Daylight Time, ... I have some fabulous pictures of our food art days!! Sculpted mashed potatoes are terribly
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/4/2003 5:35:40 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
> I dare you to consider playing with your food art, and see if he'd turn you
> down!

I have some fabulous pictures of our food art days!! Sculpted mashed potatoes
are terribly fun, especially when you can only use your fingers..no flatware.
Dessert is my favorite part....especially the squirty kind of whip cream
which makes wonderful sculptures.

Ren


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
